item.title: HBO Max 承诺为老订户保留 4K 和杜比权益
item.description:
软餐获悉，流媒体平台 HBO Max 表示，已拥有 4K 和杜比全景声（Dolby Atmos）的 HBO Max 客户，在 6 月 11 日新计划上线后也将被继续保留这两项权益。此前该公司曾表示 4K 和杜比全景声（Dolby Atmos）仅包含在高级（premium）订阅计划中。HBO Max 本周早些时候宣布了三项新的订阅，将取代当前的订阅。其中包括带有广告的基本计划、支持 1080p 的标准订阅以及支持 4K 和杜比全景声的高级订阅计划。自 HBO Max 成立以来的订户将自动转到新的标准计划，并将保留其 50% 的折扣。该公告引发了老订户担心权益 「缩水」 的担忧，现在 HBO Max 不得不出来澄清，即新政策将仅适用于新订户。

HBO Max, the streaming platform, has announced that customers who already have access to 4K and Dolby Atmos will continue to retain these benefits after the launch of their new plans on June 11th. Previously, the company had stated that 4K and Dolby Atmos were only included in the premium subscription plan. Earlier this week, HBO Max announced three new subscriptions that will replace the current ones. These include a basic plan with ads, a standard subscription supporting 1080p, and a premium subscription supporting 4K and Dolby Atmos. Subscribers since the inception of HBO Max will be automatically transitioned to the new standard plan and will retain their 50% discount. The announcement caused concerns among existing subscribers about a potential reduction in their benefits. HBO Max has now clarified that the new policy will only apply to new subscribers.

item.title: 谷歌云误删了澳大利亚养老基金组织的账户
item.description:
谷歌云（Google Cloud）曝出事故——该公司上周不慎删除了澳大利亚学术界养老基金 UniSuper 的账户，导致该组织在 Google Cloud 上的所有数据都被擦除，数十万客户无法访问他们的财务数据。谷歌云首席执行官托马斯·库里安（Thomas Kurian）在声明中写道，UniSuper 的帐户发生的错误配置导致数据被删除，且 Google Cloud 的两个副本否被删掉了。幸运的是该组织仍有另一个云服务的备份，可通过该备份恢复数据。Google Cloud 称这是一个独特的事件，世界上任何地方的 Google Cloud 客户从未遇到过此类问题。

Google Cloud encountered an incident last week when it accidentally deleted the account of UniSuper, an Australian academic retirement fund, resulting in the erasure of all their data on Google Cloud. This incident left hundreds of thousands of customers unable to access their financial data. Thomas Kurian, the CEO of Google Cloud, stated in a statement that an error in the configuration of UniSuper’s account led to the deletion of the data, and two copies of the data on Google Cloud were also erased. Fortunately, the organization had a backup on another cloud service, allowing them to restore the data from that backup. Google Cloud referred to this incident as a unique event and stated that no Google Cloud customer anywhere else in the world has experienced such an issue before.

item.title: 中国部分用户可直接使用 WhatsApp
item.description:
据彭博社，北京和上海部分用户称，他们可以正常地使用此前被禁用的 WhatsApp 服务，持续时间已有两周。这些用户可不借助其他工具直接使用 WhatsApp 软件正常收发消息。另有用户则表示，这可追溯到苹果商店下架 WhatsApp 和 Threads 开始。尚不清楚能正常使用 WhatsApp 的用户规模。令人颇感意外的是，WhatsApp 的代表拒绝发表评论。这几乎暗示该公司知道更多信息。

According to Bloomberg, some users in Beijing and Shanghai have reported being able to use the previously disabled WhatsApp service for the past two weeks. These users are able to send and receive messages using the WhatsApp application directly without the need for any other tools. Other users have indicated that this coincides with the removal of WhatsApp and Threads from the Apple App Store. It is unclear how many users are able to use WhatsApp normally. Representatives from WhatsApp have declined to comment, which is somewhat surprising and suggests that the company may have more information regarding the situation.

item.title: 电报创始人指 Signal 的加密和开源有欺骗性
item.description:
Signal 一般被认为是一款加密消息应用，但 Telegram 创始人帕维尔·杜罗夫（Pavel Durov）不这么看。他日前援引了 Twitter 的创始人杰克·多尔西（Jack Dorsey）的一篇文章，这篇文章指出，Signal 的现任领导者是美国国务院 「负责海外政权更迭的活动人士」。美国政府花费了 300 万美元来构建 Signal 的加密技术，如今，相同的加密技术也被应用于 WhatsApp、Facebook Messenger、Google Messages 甚至 Skype 中。看起来，美国的大型科技公司似乎不（被）允许自行构建独立于政府干预的加密协议。Pavel Durov 自述，一些 「重要人士」 表示他们的 Signal 消息曾 「在美国法庭或媒体中被利用」，但 Signal 对此回应其是开源的，任何人都可以验证。Pavel Durov 还指出，Signal 不允许研究人员确保他们的 GitHub 代码与用户 iPhone 上运行的 Signal 应用程序使用的代码相同。Signal 拒绝为 iOS 添加可重现构建功能，并关闭了社区的 GitHub 请求。Pavel Durov 宣称 Telegram 是 「唯一一个允许每个人确保其应用程序确实使用在 Github 上发布的相同开源代码的流行消息服务」。

Signal is generally regarded as a secure encrypted messaging application, but Telegram founder Pavel Durov begs to differ. He recently quoted a story by Jack Dorsey, the founder of Twitter, which pointed out that the current leaders of Signal are 「activists used by the US State Department for regime change abroad.」 The US government spent $3 million to build Signal’s encryption technology, and now the same encryption technology is implemented in WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Google Messages, and even Skype. It seems that large tech companies in the US are not allowed to develop their own encryption protocols independent of government interference. Pavel Durov mentioned that some 「important people」 have claimed that their Signal messages were 「exploited in US courts or media,」 but Signal’s response is that they are open source, and anyone can verify their security. Pavel Durov also pointed out that Signal does not allow researchers to ensure that their GitHub code matches the code used in the Signal app on users’ iPhones. Signal refused to add reproducible builds for iOS and closed the community’s GitHub request. Pavel Durov claims that Telegram is the 「only massively popular messaging service that allows everyone to ensure that its apps indeed use the same open source code published on GitHub.」

item.title: 微软明年推出 Exchange Server 订阅版
item.description:
微软公司通过官方博客证实，该公司将于明年发布 Exchange Server 的订阅版本，即 Exchange Server SE。此版本将在 Exchange Server 2019 和 2016 的支持结束之前发布。微软尚未公布订阅价格。微软称，Exchange Server SE 将在 2025 年第三季度初推出。在此之前，Exchange Server 2019 将收到其第 15 个也是最后一个累积更新（CU）。订阅版在代码上将与此 Exchange Server 2019 CU15 相同，因此保留了相同的系统要求。最初唯一的区别涉及许可协议、名称以及版本号。微软每年将为 Exchange Server SE 发布两次累积更新。

Microsoft has confirmed through an official blog post that the company will release a subscription version of Exchange Server next year, known as Exchange Server SE. This version will be released before the support for Exchange Server 2019 and 2016 ends. Microsoft has not yet disclosed the subscription pricing. Microsoft states that Exchange Server SE will be launched in the early third quarter of 2025. Prior to that, Exchange Server 2019 will receive its 15th and final cumulative update (CU). The subscription version will have the same codebase as Exchange Server 2019 CU15. Therefore, SE retains the same system requirements. The initial and only difference lies in the licensing agreement, name, and version number. Microsoft will release two cumulative updates per year for Exchange Server SE.
